bill.title: Medical Marijuana; Protections; Reasonable Accommodations
bill.description: Prohibits discrimination against medical marijuana patients and their caregivers by schools, landlords, courts with regard to medical care or parental rights, planned community associations, condominium property regimes, or condominiums. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HTH, JDL.
The committee(s) on HTH has scheduled a public hearing on 02-18-15 1:30PM in conference room 414.

The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HTH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Riviere, Ruderman; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Baker ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Wakai, Gabbard.

Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDL.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Shimabukuro, Espero, Gabbard; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) L. Thielen, Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 688) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).

The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Creagan, Hashem, Kobayashi, Morikawa, Fukumoto Chang; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Jordan, Oshiro; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tupola.
